118.movie_plot: A high school student and his friend find a strange, orb-like piece of equipment to use as a science project, but must stop it when it begins to threaten mankind.

119.movie_name: Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas, The (2000)

97.movie_plot: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

93.movie_plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

99.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

115.movie_plot: In 1978, four rebellious teenagers try to scam their way into a KISS concert.

102.movie_plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

121.movie_name: Lovers of the Arctic Circle, The (Los Amantes del Círculo Polar) (1998)
121.movie_plot: In Lapland Finland, under the eternal midnight sun, two ardent lovers will reunite once again after a long period apart, governed by a powerful and eloquent circular motif that is woven by destiny, faith and love.

92.movie_plot: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

96.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

108.movie_plot: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

111.movie_plot: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

100.movie_plot: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

112.movie_plot: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

101.movie_plot: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

110.movie_plot: A bureaucrat, in a retro-future world, tries to correct an administrative error, and becomes an enemy of the state.

103.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

94.movie_plot: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association of how women become different and immobilized robots.

109.movie_plot: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

107.movie_plot: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

104.movie_plot: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

114.movie_plot: A man whose daughter recently died becomes obsessed with a dancer in the night club Exotica.

113.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

95.movie_plot: A crew in Antarctica finds a neighboring camp destroyed and its crew dead. Whatever killed them is nowhere to be found, unless it's hidden in plain sight.

106.movie_name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier (1989)

105.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

12.movie_name: Day the Earth Stood Still, The (1951)
12.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

63.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
63.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

82.movie_name: Adventures of Buckaroo Bonzai Across the 8th Dimension, The (1984)

79.movie_plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

2.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

49.movie_plot: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

21.movie_plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

26.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

18.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
18.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

34.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

73.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

28.movie_plot: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

9.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

45.movie_plot: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

85.movie_plot: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

77.movie_plot: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

75.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

76.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

33.movie_plot: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.

19.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

8.movie_plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

42.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)
42.movie_plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

60.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
60.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

67.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

54.movie_plot: Lovers' lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

24.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

65.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)

89.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

15.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

17.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)

57.movie_plot: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.
